title: enemy remake in final promotion series counts as loss
body: I had 2 wins 2 losses in my 5 game silver 1 to gold 5 promotional series. the 5th game the enemy team surrendered to for a remake and it took away the series and gave me 90 lp. not sure why this counted as a loss? please help!!!!

replies.body: A remake shouldn't cost you a loss, so I looked into this for you.  It turns out that before the remake, you had another game that you ended up [queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which does count as a loss during a series.  It looks like you're back in a series since then, and I wish you the best of luck!
thank you so much for taking your time to do check it out, i really appreciate your fast response and quick work ethic
can you do anything to help riot?
